name: CockBoxing
description: WE ARE A CRYPTOCURRENCY PROJECT WITH THE GOAL OF BRINGING COCKFIGHTS TO THE MASSES. CURRENTLY, COCKFIGHTS HAVE A STRONG PRESENCE IN ASIA, WITH A LARGE VOLUME OF BETS FLOWING THROUGH THE INDUSTRY. HOWEVER, IT IS LESS VISIBLE IN OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD, AND ALSO DIFFICULT TO WAGER ON UNLESS YOU ARE AT THE ARENAS IN PERSON. MOST SPORTS GAMBLING TAKES PLACE ONLINE AT THE MOMENT, AND WE ARE IN PRIME POSITION TO CAPITALISE ON THAT (ESPECIALLY DUE TO THE SPECULATIVE NATURE OF CRYPTOCURRENCY). BETTORS WILL BE ABLE TO WAGER USDC ON THE OUTCOME OF BOUTS VIA OUR ON-CHAIN BETTING PLATFORM. IN TERMS OF THE TOKEN ITSELF, STAKING THE $COCKS TOKEN ALLOWS INVESTORS ACCESS TO OUR REVENUE SHARE PROTOCOL.
